messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] A curious discrepancy
messages.msgSnippet: and I will now answer my own question by saying that of course, the 3rd Tadatoki is the 6th Akasaka master and that will be what both books are saying, it is
messages.messageBody:
and I will now answer my own question by saying that of course, the 3rd
Tadatoki is the 6th Akasaka master and that will be what both books are
saying, it is the same guy.

Foot back in mouth.

Rich

Richard Turner wrote:

> or am I reading it wrong ?.
>
> Looking through the Sano Museum Akasaka Tsuba book, I was going through
> the mei of the Tadatoki smiths. On page 98 on plate number 2 is a mei by
> the 6th Tadatoki that reads Bushu Junin Akasaka Tadatoki and dated to
> Tenmei 9.
>
> The very same mei I believe can be found in Wakayama's Toso Kodogu Meiji
> Taikei in Book 2 on page 306 only this is being listed as the Sandai
> Tadatoki.
>
> Any clues to this ?. I would have thought Wakayama's books be he bible
> of fittings information, though a book that specializes in a particular
> school should have it's information right as well.
>
> Cheers all
>
> Rich

messages.subject: A curious discrepancy
messages.msgSnippet: or am I reading it wrong ?. Looking through the Sano Museum Akasaka Tsuba book, I was going through the mei of the Tadatoki smiths. On page 98 on plate number
messages.messageBody:
or am I reading it wrong ?.

Looking through the Sano Museum Akasaka Tsuba book, I was going through
the mei of the Tadatoki smiths. On page 98 on plate number 2 is a mei by
the 6th Tadatoki that reads Bushu Junin Akasaka Tadatoki and dated to
Tenmei 9.

The very same mei I believe can be found in Wakayama's Toso Kodogu Meiji
Taikei in Book 2 on page 306 only this is being listed as the Sandai
Tadatoki.

Any clues to this ?. I would have thought Wakayama's books be he bible
of fittings information, though a book that specializes in a particular
school should have it's information right as well.

Cheers all

Rich




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
